name: Mitigation Playbook for Web Application Vulnerability Exploitation
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited a vulnerability in a web application to execute arbitrary commands. It includes steps to kill malicious processes, remove unauthorized files, and perform a full system scan until clean.

action--f2c6ee02-3045-4c7c-bf59-e026bd5d.name: Kill malicious process
action--f2c6ee02-3045-4c7c-bf59-e026bd5d.description: Terminate any instances of the suspicious script running on the server.

action--4af3b409-5fd5-43fd-8f0e-fb2fe5f4.name: Remove unauthorized files
action--4af3b409-5fd5-43fd-8f0e-fb2fe5f4.description: Delete the unauthorized script file created in the system directory.

while-condition--a5d6e2de-7e06-4645-8eef.name: Full System Scan Loop
while-condition--a5d6e2de-7e06-4645-8eef.description: Perform a full system scan and repeat until no threats are detected.

action--a5d6e2de-7e06-4645-8eef-b8817369.name: Perform full system scan
action--a5d6e2de-7e06-4645-8eef-b8817369.description: Execute a comprehensive scan to check for any remaining threats.

scan_results.description: The result of the scan operation.

check-scan-results--d4c29f74-4757-4995-b.name: Check scan results
check-scan-results--d4c29f74-4757-4995-b.description: Determine the state of the scan results to see if the system is clean.
